items.quote: R.E.A.C.H. teaches you life lessons that actually matter. I learned how to handle my emotions and make better decisions.
items.name: Amari, 18

items.quote: The counselors didn't judge us. They helped us communicate again as a family. We're stronger now.
items.name: Parent

items.quote: RFY's school-based services have transformed our ability to support students in crisis.
items.name: School Counselor

items.quote: Watching young people transform through Teen Court reminds me why this work matters.
items.name: Teen Court Volunteer

items.quote: I was scared to ask for help. RFY made it safe. Now my children are thriving.
items.name: Maria, Mom of 3

items.quote: RFY is an essential partner in building healthier communities for our youth.
items.name: Community Partner
